Cherrycake\Modules\Patterns::getPatternFileName

getPatternFileName

Builds the complete filename and path of a pattern

    Signature

    public function getPatternFileName(string $patternName, [string $directoryOverride = null] )

    Parameters

    $patternName — string
    The pattern name
    $directoryOverride — string
    When specified, the pattern is taken from this directory instead of the default configured directory.

    Returns

    string
    The complete pattern filename
